item.title: Report E-2025020018
item.description:
Report E-2025020018

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-08T03:31:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-30
  • City: MARIETTA
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On January 30, 2025, one (1) 5-gallon pail of UN3266 was punctured and released approximately two (2) gallons to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Hull's Environmental Services (HES) to remediate the site. The crew utilized neutralizer and absorbents to remove all product from the trailer. The damaged pail and all spent absorbents were containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum for disposal.

item.title: Report E-2025010430
item.description:
Report E-2025010430

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-04T06:26:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-02
  • City: CARTERSVILLE
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ERTS
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 17:59 EST on 1/2, XPO-NRG contacted ERTS to report a spill of less than 1 ounce of "ZEP MORADO SUPER CLEANER" from a 5-gallon poly pail. The pail was damaged due to a packaging error by the shipper and only affected the outer surface of the pail. The spill was cleaned before notifying ERTS. ERTS generated waste ID: 224080-1 and staged in for terminal personnel to handle.
